pages.text: These robes take freely-gifted $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$(), preferable to the skin of slain animals, and transform them into magical robes.$(br2)Their magical nature gives protection and also imparts a boon: $(info) each piece worn decreases the costs of any spell or process that consumes herbs, starting at 2% and increasing to 8% when all four pieces are worn.
